ygData.subject: Re: DE Necro banking in RiverVale ?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/9/99 2:57:41 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... I am sure it is. As a Dark Elf Necromance, I got my faction high enough to bank in North
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/9/99 2:57:41 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
MurphyK@... writes:

> Is it possible to get a DE Necromancer's faction up high enough in rivervale
> to bank?
>

I am sure it is.

As a Dark Elf Necromance, I got my faction high enough to bank in North
Freeport. and I am sure the Paladins started hating me just as much as the
Halflings started hating me.

I would kill Goblins and Orcs in kithicor and Runneyeye until all you see is
little green crouching things in your sleep, and then kill them until you see
little green crouching things when you drive down the road, then keep killing
them until your Parents (dead, or alive, whether you are 16 or 80
yourself...) see little green crouching things.... then you can probably get
in and bank :)

I speak in orc sometimes ... that is how many of them I had to kill to get
into north Freeport.

Sonoroud Tombinder, Dark Elf Necromancer, Second rank of the 6th Circle.
